title: TextEncoder: encodeInto() method
summary:
The TextEncoder.encodeInto() method takes a
  string to encode and a destination Uint8Array to put resulting UTF-8 encoded text into, and returns a dictionary object indicating the
  progress of the encoding.
  This is potentially more performant than the older encode() method â€” especially when the target buffer is a view into a Wasm heap.
pageTitle: TextEncoder: encodeInto() method - Web APIs | MDN
